attributes.action: Charge the PM with dereliction of duty for absence of any plans on hard brexit.
attributes.additional_details: David Davis admitted today when interviewed that there has been no assessment whatsoever. Ultimately the PM has the responsibility to ensure these assessments are made and she has categorically failed to do so.
attributes.background: The intention of the PM to go ahead and risk hard brexit without ANY economic assessments or plans amounts to is a dereliction of duty and gross negligence. The drive to push on regardless of any consequences is inexcusable, as is the assumption that THIS is the will of the people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/189365
